list_definition.definition: to take or accept as true

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I assume (that) you’d like time to decide.

list_definition.definition: to take upon oneself or accept (authority, responsibility etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He assumed the role of leader in the emergency.

list_definition.definition: to put on (a particular appearance etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He assumed a look of horror.
